resources.string: We look at the phone habitually. For example, taking a rest during exercise, checking messages while studying, doing something in the toilet and etc. \n\n This application can reduce the time spent habitually looking at cell phones intuitively and dramatically. It can give you more powerful recognition of time through for visually.
\n 1. Decide the color of the Area Timer.
\n 2. Set Minute \n *Minute: Time before the area covers all screens
\n 3. Press the On button to start Area Timer.

When you look at a phone habitually, you can watch the screen that gets smaller in real time and be alert to put down your phone quickly and do important things. 

 In order to restart the area timer, you have to lock your cell phone and unlock it again. After Unlock, Area Timer restarts. 

 Click the Off button to exit the Area Timer completely.
REAL STUDY TIMER app for test-taker. Different action -> timer pauses.
